content.text: How to create a portfolio
The portfolio is essential to get noticed.
content.html: The portfolio is essential to get noticed.

content.text: Creating a portfolio is a good way of growing your online presence.
content.html: Creating a portfolio is a good way of growing your online presence.

content.text: The portfolio is used to showcase your skills and projects.
content.html: The portfolio is used to showcase your skills and projects.

content.text: It can help you to get a job, freelancer gig, or, internship.
content.html: It can help you to get a job, freelancer gig, or, internship.

content.text: What is a portfolio
The portfolio can have the same purpose as a CV. Most CVs are written with text, while the portfolio is for showcasing, so it is visual with images and often more detailed than the CV.
content.html: The portfolio can have the same purpose as a CV. Most CVs are written with text, while the portfolio is for showcasing, so it is visual with images and often more detailed than the CV.

content.text: It is a place where you can show your work experience and showcase the projects that you are most proud of.
content.html: It is a place where you can show your work experience and showcase the projects that you are most proud of.

content.text: Your online portfolio can be shared with its link to companies, hiring managers, and recruiters, so that they can notice you.
content.html: Your online portfolio can be shared with its link to companies, hiring managers, and recruiters, so that they can notice you.

content.text: It is about showing and giving others an understanding of who you are as a professional.
content.html: It is about showing and giving others an understanding of who you are as a professional.

content.text: Why create a portfolio
It is a great way of growing your online presence and get noticed.
content.html: It is a great way of growing your online presence and get noticed.

content.text: It can be used to get a job or to attract clients to your services.
content.html: It can be used to get a job or to attract clients to your services.

content.text: Having it online as a website. Makes it possible for people all over the world to find you.
content.html: Having it online as a website. Makes it possible for people all over the world to find you.

content.text: The design of the porfolio will give the reader an impression of who you are. Make sure that it appears in a good and presentable way!
content.html: The design of the porfolio will give the reader an impression of who you are. Make sure that it appears in a good and presentable way!

content.text: Who is a portfolio for
Creating a portfolio can be important for your career.
content.html: Creating a portfolio can be important for your career.

content.text: It can be helpful when searching for a job, a freelancing gig, or showcasing your skills towards a new client.
content.html: It can be helpful when searching for a job, a freelancing gig, or showcasing your skills towards a new client.

content.text: What are the most important sections in a portfolio
There are many different ways of creating a portfolio.
content.html: There are many different ways of creating a portfolio.

content.text: How to create it depends on what type of professional you are, who you are building it for, and why you are creating it.
content.html: How to create it depends on what type of professional you are, who you are building it for, and why you are creating it.

content.text: You have to test, fail and learn to find out which type of portfolio that is right for you!
content.html: You have to test, fail and learn to find out which type of portfolio that is right for you!

content.text: There are some sections which is essential for all types of portfolios, summarized below:
content.html: There are some sections which is essential for all types of portfolios, summarized below:

content.text: 1. Hero section.
content.html: 1. Hero section.

content.text: The hero section is the first thing people see when they enter your portfolio.
content.html: The hero section is the first thing people see when they enter your portfolio.

content.text: It is displayed under your logo and menu.
content.html: It is displayed under your logo and menu.

content.text: The hero section helps the reader to understand what you offer, why someone should work with you, and the value that you provide with your services.
content.html: The hero section helps the reader to understand what you offer, why someone should work with you, and the value that you provide with your services.

content.text: It often contains a call to action button like "contact me", "book a meeting" or similar.
content.html: It often contains a call to action button like "contact me", "book a meeting" or similar.

content.text: 2. About me section.
content.html: 2. About me section.

content.text: Give the reader a short summary about yourself.
content.html: Give the reader a short summary about yourself.

content.text: Include subjects such as your education, work experience, projects and interests.
content.html: Include subjects such as your education, work experience, projects and interests.

content.text: Help the reader to understand what you are passionate about and your superpowers (the things that you are really good at).
content.html: Help the reader to understand what you are passionate about and your superpowers (the things that you are really good at).

content.text: Remember to keep it short and simple.
content.html: Remember to keep it short and simple.

content.text: 3. Projects section.
content.html: 3. Projects section.

content.text: List the projects that you have worked on. The most used way is to order the list by date, but in some cases it can make sense to order them in another logical way.
content.html: List the projects that you have worked on. The most used way is to order the list by date, but in some cases it can make sense to order them in another logical way.

content.text: Add details to each project, which includes your role, what you did, and, how the project turned out.
content.html: Add details to each project, which includes your role, what you did, and, how the project turned out.

content.text: Adding pictures to showcase what you built is a plus! Showcase the things that you are proud of.
content.html: Adding pictures to showcase what you built is a plus! Showcase the things that you are proud of.

content.text: 4. Contact me section.
content.html: 4. Contact me section.

content.text: Let the reader know how and where they can get in touch with you.
content.html: Let the reader know how and where they can get in touch with you.

content.text: Add your contact details and other contact channels such as your GitHub profile, LinkedIn, Youtube and so on.
content.html: Add your contact details and other contact channels such as your GitHub profile, LinkedIn, Youtube and so on.
